Waterbury.Prospect, Connecticut:
Prospect is a town in New Haven County, Connecticut, United States. The population was 9,405 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, the town has a total area of 14.5 square miles (38 km2), of which 14.3 square miles (37 km2) is land and 0.2 square miles (0.52 km2), or 1.58%, is water.
